Description: BoostmyAds is a cloud based market place that facilitates advertising products and services, and secures payments.
Full Description: BoostmyAds is a cloud-based marketplace filled with innovative advertising and marketing services presented by producers (sellers) from all over the world. The platform is the one place where advertisers (buyers) can create a campaign with online and offline services from multiple producers across the globe to get their products in front of targeted customers.  For advertising producers, agencies and agents, BoostmyAds offers a unified platform to showcase your talent, innovation and global media solutions to potential buyers. For an advertiser, BoostmyAds delivers simplicity, ease of use and the freedom to create and launch advertising campaigns, maximizing the value in every transaction.    BoostmyAds facilitates the sale of advertising products and services, secures payments and provides intuitive management tools.   There is no geographical limitation. The global access platform provides you with the opportunity to gain global insight to your campaign. This is the first global platform to offer the freedom to access multiple media types and sources from anywhere in the world.   BoostmyAds is a self-service platform in which customers identify and purchase the advertising products and services that meet their specific needs. Each offering must have a final price and provide both media space and services to customers. Service offers also have a limited duration, eliminating the need for a permanent relationship between producers and advertisers. You get exactly what was offered on the product page. BoostmyAds is an all-in-one solution. All communication between producers and advertisers, creative uploads and financial transactions take place within the platform. Once an advertiser makes a purchase, BoostmyAds places the money in a holding account until the producer completes the service and reconciles with the advertiser.    BoostmyAds only takes a fee when a transaction is complete.

Description: Smart Biometric Sensor Technology
Full Description: Bodytrak® is unique. It exploits the only body site from which all vital signs can be measured. From one small non-invasive, in-ear device, metrics including core body temperature, heart rate, VO2 and motion (speed, distance, cadence) are sent wirelessly to the user in real-time via a smart phone, smart watch or internet hub. Since Bodytrak® accesses the ear, it detects changes in body physiology rapidly and accurately due to its close proximity to the brain, more effectively than when measuring at the periphery of the body. Machine learning algorithms enable early intervention to improve outcomes and reduce injury and associated insurance premiums. By utilising miniature components, Bodytrak® also provides two-way communications, music playback and ambient sound transparency to meet the different needs of the sport, defence, first response, health and safety, and healthcare markets. Bodytrak® has been gold-standard tested by leading universities, and we have over 40 trial partners across all target markets.  We also have a growing patent portfolio as well as significant value in our proprietary analytics.

Internationally, Booking.com is supported by various local companies – below, you can see the list of our support companies worldwide. It is the job of these support companies to provide in-country support for Booking.com, and in some instances, to provide customer care support. The support companies do not provide an online reservations service and they do not own, control, host, manage or maintain the Booking.com website (or any other website).  Booking.com is domiciled only at its registered office in Amsterdam and not at the offices of any support companies around the world. The support companies are not authorised to act as Booking.com’s process or service agents. Description: AI & Bots agency | Conversational Experience Platform | Proprietary AI
Full Description: AI & Bots agency: Where creativity and AI intersect. We combine the latest AI trends with our creative vision to create, shape & build leading AI solutions & bots, that feel and work great. We help leading brands drive their business outcomes creating for them great customer experiences and products using our platform, conversational UX and cutting edge AI. - The Conversational Experience Platform: Using our extensive hands-on experience building bots we're building - in our opinion - the ultimate enterprise-level bot platform. The Conversational Experience Platform enables anyone from a partner to a customer support employee to a marketeer to control all aspects of their bot from building, deploying and measuring it, to setting up advanced personalization, testing and more. Our proprietary NLP (see below) comes built into the platform with add-on modules for Watson, Luis, Dialogflow et al. The cloud-first modular platform is highly customizable and offers APIs for developers to add custom integrations and build individual platform experiences to each bot owner. - Proprietary AI: Our world-class AI team have created proprietary algorithms which can understand Danish, English, Italian, Swedish (beta), and Norwegian (beta).  We use the power of representational learning which helps our NLP core engine to understand the context in any given query without performing any kind of translation.  Our NLP core engine is a hybrid Architecture of Statistical Modeling and Neural Language Modelling. On top of that to achieve higher accuracy on any provided domain we perform transfer learning with the provided dataset. The approach of transfer learning and domain adaptation has been inspired by Computer Vision applications, and we have empirically proved it to be very effective for many of our use cases. Furthermore, this makes our NLP engine to be domain and language agnostic. We are also researching on automating the continuous learning process, which will help our engine to improve upon feedback. We're researched on developing an algorithm where the model only modifies the old learned information if the new information is related to it. Otherwise, all the previously learned weights are kept intact. We train a memory model to keep a track of all the past relationships(similarity measure) within the data and a contribution measure of each data point to the global loss.  This way we can avoid catastrophic forgetting of the previous correct learned weights

KNOW YOURSELF: Designed to capture vital health parameters and to create personalised prevention programmes for individuals, as well as to detect and monitor community and population health data, BodyO is a UAE-headquartered health tech company. With a proprietary algorithm combined with AI functionalities, the ‘self-service’ one-stop full body digital AIPod scanners features 17 sensors with the ability to track a wide range of vital parameters from weight and body fat to oxygen saturation, blood sugar and HRV (stress levels) in just seven minutes. Of paramount importance is the fact that the scanners can also detect serious illnesses such as chronic heart disease and diabetes, both of which are a current priority for authorities and local healthcare providers. AI pod will allow prediction, diagnostic and teleconsultation in the next version. LIVE HEALTHIER: A crucial goal for the BodyO team is to get the population more actively involved in taking charge of their own health and adopting a preventive approach to future issues by using the AI pods and App. There is also the potential to add value for corporate clients for whom employee insurance premiums need to be carefully managed, with the BodyO pods offering additional benefits as part of any corporate wellness programme.  The pods are further supported by a newly launched BodyO App (iOS and Android), that empowers and incentivizes users to be proactive when it comes to managing their health and wellbeing. The freedom to access App is centered around a platform that captures and tracks user activity (AI pod, wearable devices etc.) and pairs this with bespoke health, fitness and nutrition programmes, that BodyO plans to offer for a nominal monthly user fee.  ENGAGE AND REWARDS: Users can also earn BodyO Token Rewards redeemable at various health and wellness-related locations. Rewards will be given along AI Pod health check-up, showing good health and wellness behavior, reach their goal in showing improvement in different scoring.

For OEMs and their dealer networks, boats.com offers effective marketing tools to promote and sell new and used boats for sale across the globe. boats.com was originally launched as a private, venture capital-funded start-up in San Francisco, CA to leverage the dot com boom in the boating niche. In January 2000, boats.com acquired YachtWorld, marking the first Internet content deal within the boating industry. Just a few months later, boats.com expanded its offerings to the European market. Ian Atkins opened the first European office in Fareham, England to launch boats.com to the European markets and provide dedicated sites for the UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, and Australia. Dominion Enterprises (then Trader Publishing Company), acquired boats.com and YachtWorld in 2004. For the next six years, boats.com focused on building content, including editorial, videos, reviews and global boat listings, which positioned the brand as the site for “everything boats.” In 2010, boats.com, YachtWorld and Boat Trader joined forces as the three leading marine websites to form Dominion Marine Media within Dominion Enterprises.

Full Description: BouncePilot is noCRM eCommerce email retargeting and marketing automation. We work with Fortune 1000 companies in the US across the eCommerce, media, travel, retail, and B2B spaces. It's easiest to think about it like this: combine the principles of email remarketing and ad retargeting. You target visitors who bounce from your site. Instead of showing them an ad, you use the highest converting marketing medium available: email. Retargeted emails convert 16x better than retargeted ads. Your problem: Today, you have great email remarketing programs. Your abandoned cart and product campaigns convert into great revenue. You email every visitor you recognize, which is about 10% of them. Unfortunately, many of your visitors are first-time visitors, anonymous, or people who have cleared their cookies. BouncePilot extends your email retargeting audience to the other 90% – your unidentified visitors. Get a free trial on www.bouncepilot.com. Description: Bolloré provides transportation and logistics services relating to sea and air transportation networks.
Full Description: Bolloré provides transportation and logistics services relating to sea and air transportation networks in France, Europe, Africa, the Asia Pacific, and the Americas. It operates through Transportation and Logistics, Oil Logistics, Communications, Electricity and Storage Solutions, and Other Activities segments.  Bolloré engages in air, sea, and land freight forwarding; warehousing and distribution activities; and industrial logistics, safety and quality control, and port operations, as well as offers general cargo and aircraft chartering, shipping, stevedoring, shipping agency, and transportation services. It also distributes and stores domestic fuel and other oil products through its service stations; provides technical services, including boiler sale and maintenance, heating subscription, and heating pumps; and offers bunkering services.  Bolloré operates approximately 627 kilometers of Donges-Melun-Metz oil pipelines. Moreover, it provides communication consultancy services, including creative advertising, media buying, digital media, direct marketing, corporate communication, sales promotion, design, human resources, sports marketing, multimedia interactive communications, and public relations; Direct Matin, a free daily newspaper; wireless broadband services; and computing advice and software designing services, as well as manages a portfolio of shareholdings in the communication and agriculture sectors.  Further, Bolloré manufactures polypropylene films for capacitors; energy storage components; packaging films; and electric lithium metal polymer batteries for electric mobility and stationary solutions. Additionally, it develops electric vehicles, energy storage solutions, electric car-sharing systems, self-service terminals, automatic identification solutions, and security and access control equipment.  Bolloré began operation in 1822, with its headquarters in Puteaux in France. It operates as a subsidiary of Bolloré.

Boxbe is an integrated email helper enabling Gmail, Yahoo and AOL users to prioritize and reduce email overload.
Full Description: Boxbe is a free service that claims to help people manage their Inbox and deal effectively with volumes of email. The service is an add-on for existing email addresses and accounts. It currently supports Gmail (along with whole domains through Google Apps), Yahoo! Mail, and AOL. Once Boxbe is configured, email messages are automatically prioritized and screened as they arrive. Priority is based primarily upon the sender's identity. A member's priority list is automatically updated, and can also be viewed and edited directly. The company performs several checks to verify the authenticity of email senders. Some messages are modified to provide navigation links when delivered. A controversial aspect of the service is its 'Courtesy Notice', a short email notice sent in behalf of a member to the sender of a message when they are unknown. The notice provides the sender with a link that lets them have their message "promoted". The service also encourages its members to invite their friends, claiming that doing so will improve the handling and priority given to email through its "Friend of Friend" feature. Perhaps due to poorly worded screens or navigation, some members have been angered when they inadvertently invite their entire address books. Consequently, Boxbe has been accused of creating spam to promote their service.

Their customers aren’t just “customers” to them; the products they protect are part of their lives, too.   They know firsthand how difficult it is to build a large, reputable company and valuable intellectual property.   They believe these companies – and their consumers - should be protected from unauthorized online counterfeiters diverting traffic and confusing the public.    Your expertise is in creating brands that people care about.   Their expertise is in creating technology that gives you new insights and resources that can best protect your market share and brand reputation.   They are proud to be a leader in the fight against piracy, infringement, and online market theft, and will continue evolving their products and services to keep you one step ahead.

BookedIN has everything a business needs to get up and running in a fast and easy way.

Improving human performance and accelerating rehabilitation through enhanced strength training and biometrics
Full Description: Boston Biomotion, a NYC-based sports and healthtech company has developed the Proteus system—cutting-edge hardware and analytics software that fundamentally alters and improves the way athletes rehab and train.  The company’s Proteus system is the combination of a new strength-training solution and an innovative software platform for athletes, coaches, trainers, and physical therapists.  The Proteus system provides the first-ever 3D resistance, called Collinear Resistance (like aquatic therapy on land).  Proteus’ software provides advanced analytics including first-ever muscle performance data in 3D space and time meant to transform into a virtual physical therapist or trainer. The Proteus system uniquely provides concentric-biased resistance in 3 dimensions that almost entirely eliminates in-season stress, strain, and tissue damage, while achieving high muscle activation.   While Proteus is used by players, advanced analytics are automatically collected so performance is tracked and monitored, along with workload, compliance, imbalance, and physical change—revealing trends in performance in-season without the addition of deleterious training volume.

Description: Buy and rent college books for less. Sell textbooks for more.
Full Description: Bookbyte is an e-commerce company based in Salem, Oregon, with a business focus of renting and selling used textbooks. Bookbyte buys textbooks back and offers digital publishing services as well. Bookbyte buys, rents, and sells new and used textbooks. Customers can search for textbooks by title, author, or ISBN via Bookbyte’s website, iOS app, or Android app, with textbook prices being determined by condition and demand. Bookbyte also has a wholesale operation that buys and sells textbooks to college bookstores in the United States. Bookbyte has been in operation since 1999, making it one of the oldest companies in the used textbook internet retail industry. In 2010 Bookbyte was selected by the Salem Area Chamber of Commerce as the Employer of the Year in recognition of its dedication to its employees and the community. As of 2012, Bookbyte has more than 80 employees and is headquartered in a large warehouse facility in Salem, Oregon, where it also has a storefront.

Description: BofI Federal Bank (NASDAQ: BOFI), is a nationwide bank that provides financing for single and multifamily residential properties.
Full Description: BofI Holding, Inc. is a holding company for BofI Federal Bank, a diversified financial services company. The Bank operate its bank from a single location in San Diego, California, serving approximately 40,000 retail deposit and loan customers across all 50 states. As of June 30, 2012, it had total assets of $2,386.8 million, loans of $1,799.7 million, mortgage-backed and other investment securities of $483.0 million, total deposits of $1,615.1 million and borrowings of $547.2 million. It distributes its deposit products through a range of retail distributions channels, and its deposits consist of demand, savings and time deposits accounts. It distributes its loan products through its retail, correspondent and wholesale channels, and the loans it retains are primarily first mortgages secured by single family real property and by multifamily real property.

Description: Bosley Medical is a company specializing in treatments for hair loss.
Full Description: Bosley is one of the world’s most experienced hair restoration expert, having performed over 230,000 hair transplantation procedures, on men and women, from over 60 countries.  Founded by Dr. L. Lee Bosley in 1974, the company is a veteran in the field of hair restoration. By always pioneering the latest hair transplant technology, it provides state of the art facilities to its patients, with 23 surgical offices and47consultation offices in the United States, Canada, and Mexico, with its corporate headquarters located in Beverly Hills, California. The company also offers eyebrow restoration treatment, and markets products that facilitate hair growth - such as the FDA approved Laser Comb Elite, suitable for both men and women. Its physicians and counselors have vast experience and knowledge in the field, and offer patients sophisticated treatment, and quality professional guidance.

Description: Bountey is a monetization platform for content creators. It works like a poll, but instead of locking votes, the audience locks money.
Full Description: Funding creative content is hard, and nobody wants to ask for money. Bountey is a platform that enables content creators to post fundable goals or ideas called Bounteys. Your audience can then prevalidate these Bounteys by backing them with money. Once a Boutney is funded, you can either accept it and receive the money, or reject it and we'll automatically issue a 100% refund to your audience for you. Content creators don't ask for money, they ask for input.

Description: Boubyan Petrochemical Company is a Kuwaiti government-controlled petrochemical company.
Full Description: Boubyan Petrochemical Company (BPC) was established in 1995 as the first privately held company to enter the government-controlled petrochemical arena in Kuwait. BPC entered into a JV with Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) and Union Carbide (subsequently acquired by Dow Chemical) and formed Equate Petrochemical Company - the largest petrochemical complex in Kuwait. BPC has since evolved into an industrial holding company with investments focused in petrochemicals and the industrial/manufacturing sectors and has recently also ventured into the education and healthcare sectors.

Description: The Bosch division Security Systems is a leading global supplier of security, safety.
Full Description: The Bosch division Security Systems is a leading global supplier of security, safety, and communications products and systems. In selected countries Bosch offers solutions and services for building security, energy efficiency and building automation. More than 13,000 associates generated sales of roughly 1.7 billion euros in 2015*. Protecting lives, buildings and assets is the major aim. The product portfolio includes video surveillance, intrusion detection, fire detection and voice evacuation systems as well as access control and management systems. Professional audio and conference systems for communication of voice, sound and music complete the range. Bosch Security Systems develops and manufactures in its own plants in Europe, Americas and Asia.
